imdb.plot outline: The Best You Possible with Donta Tanner follows real people with a variety of goals and reasons to stay fit. Donta, host and IFBB Pro takes us on a journey of how to become The Best You Possible through fitness from competitive levels, injury recovery and personal goals despite his various clients sizes, ages and backgrounds.
imdb.title: The Best You Possible with Donta Tanner
akas: The Best You Possible with Donta Tanner (United States)
plot: Reach and become the best you possible through fitness and exercise with ifbb pro and personal fitness trainer donta tanner.::The World Waiting

_The Best You Possible with Donta Tanner_ (qv) follows real people with a variety of goals and reasons to stay fit. Donta, host and IFBB Pro takes us on a journey of how to become The Best You Possible through fitness from competitive levels, injury recovery and personal goals despite his various clients sizes, ages and backgrounds.::The World Waiting

THE BEST YOU POSSIBLE WITH DONTA TANNER is a fitness TV SHOW dedicated to the achievements, goals and challenges set forth by a variety of guest ranging from beginners to competitors that emphasizes and implements the necessary measures and steps taking to reach and become THE BEST YOU POSSIBLE through fitness and exercise with IFBB PRO and PERSONAL FITNESS TRAINER DONTA TANNER.::The World Waiting
